code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Helmet}from'react-helmet';import NewsGrid from'./NewsGrid';import TopicSidebar from'./TopicSidebar';import{fetchArticles}from'../services/api';import'./Dashboard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[news,setNews]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[selectedTopic,setSelectedTopic]=useState('global');const[language,setLanguage]=useState('en');useEffect(()=>{const getNews=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const articles=await fetchArticles({topic:selectedTopic,language});setNews(articles);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching news:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};getNews();},[selectedTopic,language]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Helmet,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("title",{children:"AI News Aggregator - Latest News on Technology and Innovation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"description",content:"Stay updated with the latest news on technology, AI, and innovation, curated and summarized by our AI-powered news aggregator."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"keywords",content:"AI news, technology news, innovation, artificial intelligence, news aggregator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:title",content:"AI News Aggregator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:description",content:"AI-powered news curation and summarization"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{property:"og:type",content:"website"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("link",{rel:"canonical",href:"https://your-domain.com"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dashboard",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-layout",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TopicSidebar,{onTopicSelect:setSelectedTopic,selectedTopic:selectedTopic}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"AI News Aggregator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:language,onChange:e=>setLanguage(e.target.value),className:"language-select",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"en",children:"English"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"hi",children:"\u0939\u093F\u0902\u0926\u0940"})]})]}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loader",children:"Loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NewsGrid,{articles:news})]})]})})]});};export default Dashboard;
